titleStmt.title: Oxford-shire Betty: containing her joaking letter to Tom the taylor, near Tower-Street; who she has fairly left in the lurch, and married with a parson. Tune of, I love you more and more each day.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for C[harles]. Bates, next the Crown Tavern, in West Smithfield.,

notesStmt.note: Publishers' name, date and place of publication from Wing.
Verse: "Poor Tom the taylor don't lament ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
